title: Canadian vs USA rp rates
body: the CAD is now at 82 cents for every USD but our rp rates are still adjusted to when the CAD fell to about 70 cents to a USD. Why haven't the rp rates for Canadians been adjusted so we actually get what we pay for?

replies.body: I don't deal with the ecommerce team too much, so I'm really not entirely sure what might be going on with those prices and rp rates. Let's get you over to our billing team who should be able to explain all of that much better than I can! Feel free to hit them up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!
